item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Niall: We probably shouldn’t have a currency based on feathers, as it is easy to make and won’t last forever.
There is a greater guarantee in paper money than in gold.

Lets take the Norwegian krone as an example. One important tasks of the Norwegian central bank is to prevent it from being to expensive. And if the government tried to make it useless they would get the whole population against them.

With Gold you have no such control mechanism to keep it stable.
